th.name: patient_num
th.desc: A unique number assigned to each patient in DataWarehouse

th.name: store_num
th.desc: Store where the patient enrolled

th.name: store_num_resolve
th.desc: Store where the message was resolved

th.name: receive_date
th.desc: Date the message was received

th.name: update_date
th.desc: Date the message was updated (trigger field for this table)

th.name: message_text
th.desc: Text of the message- may contain html tags

th.name: message_status
th.desc: Status of the message as of the update date

th.name: message_type
th.desc: Type of message triggered

th.name: message_pri
th.desc: Priority of message

th.name: message_key
th.desc: Unique identifier key for this particular message

th.name: program_name
th.desc: Name of the CPS program that triggered this message

th.name: program_tag
th.desc: Tag to help identify the Program that triggered the message

th.name: program_type
th.desc: Type of clinical program such as Self-Directed Program or Vendor Program for this message

th.name: enroll_type
th.desc: Type of enrollments allowed in this program such as Patient Enrollment or No Enrollment

th.name: due_date
th.desc: Date this message was set to be due

th.name: expire_date
th.desc: Date this message was set to expire

th.name: updated_by_emp
th.desc: User who updated the message

th.name: rx_num
th.desc: The prescription number of the drug that was dispensed

th.name: refill_num
th.desc: The refill number of the drug that was dispensed

th.name: msg_assignee
th.desc: Message Assignee
